translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Bandhujīvaka

analyzed: vīthi sammajja katthera apadāna  uda entam sa taras iva  pītarasiva
translated: The Elder Vīthisammajjakatthera’s Birth Story🔽Like the rising sun,🔽like the sun’s rays,
like the moon on the fifteenth day,
the Leader of the World was leaving.
Sixty-eight thousand,
all of them had destroyed the pollutants;
they surrounded the Buddha,

analyzed: dvipad indam narāsabha  sammajjitvāna tam vīthi
translated: the Leader of the World, the Best of Men.🔽Having swept that street,
when the Leader of the World was leaving,
I raised up a flag there,
with a clear mind.
For ninety-one eons,
the flag I raised up,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving a flag.
In the fourth future eon,
I was a king of great strength;
I was endowed with every quality,
well-known as Sudhaja.
The four analytical insights,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā vīthisammajjako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā vīthisammajjakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the elder Vīthisammajjakatthera spoke these verses.
The Elder Vīthisammajjakatthera’s Birth Story, the third.
